Projects.Title: Public Poll Mobile App
Projects.Description: This is a mobile app I made with Flutter, Apache Tomcat (Java), SQL, and some use of Redis. It allows users to create accounts, create, respond to, and save polls, and even comment on those polls. I developed a custom authentication system, polls, and comment systems

Projects.Title: PinpointAVL
Projects.Description: A short post about my experience building robust embedded systems for an AVL tracker
